title: 97/609/EC: Commission Decision of 30 July 1997 on the clearance of the accounts of certain Member States' expenditure financed by the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund (EAGGF), Guarantee Section, for the 1996 financial year
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30 July 1997 on the clearance of the accounts of certain Member States' expenditure financed by the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund (EAGGF), Guarantee Section, for the 1996 financial year (97/609/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The accounts of the paying agencies of the Member States concerning expenditure financed by the EAGGF Guarantee Section in respect of the 1996 financial year cleared by this Decision are as shown in Annex I.
The amounts which are recoverable from, or payable to, each Member State in accordance with the present clearance of accounts are set out in Annex II to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
